EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Email Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Interest in a Trial of Tricentis Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Trial Customer}},
Thanks for signing up for a trial version of Tricentis Tosca Testsuite. You can download your trial including documentation here: Start Download <https://support.tricentis.com/trial/Trial.zip>.
The download contains a compressed file, TOSCA_TRIAL.zip. The installation guide <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/TOSCA_Installation_Guide_en.pdf> takes you through the installation process.
The quickest way to get acquainted with Tosca is to take the Online Tutorial <https://www.udemy.com/courses/search/?q=Tosca>.
If you have any questions about Tosca Testsuite, feel free to contact the Tricentis Support Team either by phone or email. We are there for you from Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. in your local time zone. For further details, please visit our homepage at https://support.tricentis.com/en/contact <https://support.tricentis.com/en/contact>.
Information on our company and the available products can be found on our homepage at http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com>.
Happy testing!
The Tricentis Team
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
